import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {Form,Button,Col,Row,ListGroup,Image,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart) return (
//variant="flush">

SHIPPING

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.state}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country},

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
